definitions.definition: of or belonging to the speaker or writer
used in exclamations to express surprise, etc.

examples.text: **Oh my!** What are we going to do?
**My my** Megan, I do believe you 're jealous!

definitions.definition: used when speaking to somebody, to show love
used when speaking to somebody that you consider to have a lower status than you

wordOrigin: Middle English mi (originally before words beginning with any consonant except h-), reduced from min, from Old English mīn, of Germanic origin.
